title: Sophos security advisory (AV25-443)
description: On July 21, 2025, Sophos published security advisories to address critical vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Sophos Firewall  version v21.0 GA (21.0.0) and prior
Sophos Firewall  version v21.5 GA (21.5.0) and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
